name: node-concurrently-starter
description: A simple package for running a client and server local dev environment with concurrently.  Scripts to install demos included.
author: James Lowe

scripts.start: concurrently "cd node-express-mongoose-boilerplate && npm run server" "cd react-redux-semantic-boilerplate && npm run start"
scripts.demo-install: cd node-express-mongoose-boilerplate && npm install && cd ../react-redux-semantic-boilerplate && npm install
